cause.description:
This fall, I am running the San Francisco Nike Women's Marathon with The Leukemia and Lymphoma Society's Team in Training.
While I pursue this endurance challenge, I have to raise funds for the cure of Leukemia and Hodgkins' Leukemia. Not only is this marathon a fitness challenge for me, but it is also a race that I will run in honor of a role model, Corey Kelly, whom I lost to Hodgkin's lymphoma in 2003. He was only 32 years old.
You can learn more about my efforts and make a donation by visiting my Web site:
http://www.active.com/donate/tntnyc/bcureton
The donation amount can be as little as $20. After all, every little bit counts. I just need all the help I can get.
1. Every five minutes someone in the United States learns that he or she has a blood cancer
2. Nearly 786,000 American adults and children are now living with blood cancer
3. An estimated 54,000 will die this year
cause.mission: Cure leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin's disease and myeloma, and improve the quality of life of patients and their families
cause.name: The Leukemia and Lymphoma Society
